main.description: Published requests or offers, sometimes with what is expected in return.

hasBeginning.description: The planned or actual beginning date, and time if desired, of a flow or process.

hasEnd.description: The planned or actual ending date, and time if desired, of a flow or process.

unitBased.description: This group of intents contains unit based quantities, which can be multipied to create commitments; commonly seen in a price list or e-commerce. Default false.

purpose.description: The type of proposal, whether offer or request (others may be added as need arises).

created.description: The date, and time if desired, the information was agreed to or recorded.

eligibleLocation.description: Location or area where the proposal is valid.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for an object. Does not imply uniqueness.

note.description: Any useful textual information related to the item.

publishes.description: The primary intent(s) of this published proposal. Would be used in intent matching.

reciprocal.description: The reciprocal intent(s) of this published proposal. Not meant to be used for intent matching.

proposedTo.description: The agent(s) to which the proposal or proposal list is published.

listedIn.description: This proposal is part of these lists of proposals.
